text: "Wouldn't It Be Good" is a 1984 song by English singer-songwriter Nik Kershaw and is the second single from his debut studio album Human Racing. It reached the top five in the United Kingdom and was covered by German band Cascada in 2006. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Nik Kershaw songs Category:Tina Arena songs Category:Placebo (band) songs
title: Wouldn't It Be Good
